MySQL on Mac OS X

26 February 2012

Install MySQL using Homebrew

$ brew install mysql

Set up databases to run with your user with:

$ unset TMPDIR
$ mysql_install_db --verbose \
                   --user=`whoami` \
                   --basedir="$(brew --prefix mysql)" \ 
                   --datadir=/usr/local/var/mysql \
                   --tmpdir=/tmp

Start MySQL Daemon

$ mysql.server start

Connect

$ mysql -uroot
[â€¦]	
mysql>

Stop MySQL Daemon

$ mysql.server stop
